translatePage.title: Professional Message Rewriting — Powered by AI
translatePage.description: Select a message type and customize the context to generate culturally appropriate translations
translatePage.formalityCasualTooltip: Relaxed, conversational language with no formal structure.
translatePage.formalityInformalTooltip: Friendly and professional, but without strict conventions.
translatePage.formalityNeutralTooltip: Standard professional tone with balanced structure and clarity.
translatePage.formalityFormalTooltip: Polished, structured language following professional norms.
translatePage.formalityInstitutionalTooltip: Official, policy-aligned wording suitable for legal or HR contexts.
translatePage.directnessIndirectTooltip: The message is implied rather than stated outright.
translatePage.directnessDiplomaticTooltip: Clear intent delivered with softening language.
translatePage.directnessClearTooltip: The message is explicit, balanced, and easy to understand.
translatePage.directnessDirectTooltip: The point is stated plainly with minimal cushioning.
translatePage.directnessBluntTooltip: The message is delivered without softening or mitigation.
translatePage.emotionalSensitivityLowTooltip: Focuses on facts and outcomes, not emotions.
translatePage.emotionalSensitivityContainedTooltip: Acknowledges emotion briefly without centering it.
translatePage.emotionalSensitivityAttentiveTooltip: Recognizes emotional impact while staying task-focused.
translatePage.emotionalSensitivitySensitiveTooltip: Actively validates feelings alongside the message.
translatePage.emotionalSensitivityHighTooltip: Emotion is central and carefully addressed throughout.
translatePage.customInputDescription: Enter your own message title and topic description
translatePage.customInputTopicPlaceholder: e.g., Politely declining a meeting invitation due to schedule conflicts
translatePage.disclaimerText1: The content generated by this application is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It does not constitute legal, professional, or contractual advice.
translatePage.disclaimerText2: The use of any suggested wording, recommendations, or examples is entirely at your own discretion and risk. The operators of this application assume no responsibility or liability for any outcomes, decisions, or consequences resulting from the use of the generated content.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Sentenly ('we', 'us', or 'our') is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our professional message rewriting service.

account.title: Account Information
account.content: When you create an account, we collect your email address and authentication details through Firebase Authentication.

usage.title: Usage Data
usage.content: We collect information about how you use our service, including the messages you translate, context settings, and credit usage.

content.title: Content Data
content.content: The text content you submit for translation is temporarily processed by our AI service (OpenAI) and is not stored permanently on our servers.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.item1: To provide and maintain our translation service
howWeUse.item2: To process your translations and apply context-aware adjustments
howWeUse.item3: To manage your account and credits
howWeUse.item4: To communicate with you about service updates and support
howWeUse.item5: To improve our service and develop new features

security.title: Data Storage and Security
security.content: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your data. Your account information is stored securely using Firebase, and payment information is processed through Stripe's secure payment infrastructure. We do not store your credit card details.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.intro: We use the following trusted third-party services:

rights.title: Your Rights (GDPR Compliance)
rights.access: Right to access your personal data
rights.erasure: Right to delete your account and data

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use essential cookies for authentication and service functionality. We do not use advertising or tracking cookies.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your account information as long as your account is active. Translation content is not permanently stored. You can request account deletion at any time.

transfers.title: International Data Transfers
transfers.content: Your data may be transferred to and processed in countries outside your residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for international data transfers.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our service is not intended for users under 16 years of age. We do not knowingly collect information from children.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes via email or through our service.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us:

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your access to and use of Sentenly's professional message rewriting service. By using our service, you agree to these Terms.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By creating an account or using our service, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy.

service.title: Description of Service
service.content: Sentenly provides an AI-powered message rewriting service that helps users create culturally appropriate, context-aware professional communications in multiple languages.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.intro: To use our service, you must:
accounts.item1: Provide accurate and complete registration information
accounts.item2: Maintain the security of your account credentials
accounts.item3: Be at least 16 years of age
accounts.item4: Notify us immediately of any unauthorized access

payment.title: Credits and Payment
payment.intro: Our service operates on a credit-based system:
payment.item1: New users receive 5 free credits to try the service
payment.item3: Credits can be purchased through our pricing page
payment.item4: All payments are processed securely through Stripe
payment.item5: Credits are non-refundable except as required by law

acceptable.title: Acceptable Use Policy
acceptable.intro: You agree not to use our service to:
acceptable.item1: Generate illegal, harmful, or abusive content
acceptable.item2: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
acceptable.item4: Attempt to reverse engineer or compromise our service
acceptable.item5: Create automated scripts or bots without authorization

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: You retain ownership of the content you submit. The translated output is provided to you for your use. Sentenly retains all rights to the service itself, including software, design, and branding.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: Our service is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind. While we strive for accuracy, AI-generated translations may contain errors. You are responsible for reviewing and verifying all translated content before use.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Sentenly shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of our service.

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold Sentenly harmless from any claims, damages, or expenses arising from your use of the service or violation of these Terms.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account for violations of these Terms. You may close your account at any time.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may modify these Terms at any time. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms are governed by the laws of Switzerland. Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of Switzerland.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: For questions about these Terms, please contact us:

contact.title: Contact & Support
contact.subtitle: Get help or reach out to our team
contact.emailDescription: Have a question, feedback, or need help? We're here to assist you.
contact.stillNeedHelpDescription: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Reach out to our support team.

account.title: Account & Credits
account.a1: Simply sign up with your email, and you'll receive 5 free credits to try the service. No credit card required.
account.a2: Each message rewrite costs 1 credit. You can purchase credit packs as needed through our pricing page. Credits never expire.
account.q3: What happens when I run out of credits?
account.a3: You can purchase more credits anytime from the pricing page. You can also earn free credits by inviting colleagues to use the service.

billing.title: Billing & Payments
billing.q1: What payment methods do you accept?
billing.a1: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) through our secure payment processor Stripe.
billing.a2: Credits are non-refundable except as required by law. However, credits never expire, so you can use them whenever you need.
billing.a3: No, your credits never expire. Purchase once and use them whenever you need professional message rewrites.

technical.title: Technical Support
technical.a1: Make sure you have sufficient credits and a stable internet connection. If the issue persists, try refreshing the page or contact support.
technical.a2: We support English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Portuguese, and Dutch. More languages are coming soon.
technical.a3: The maximum character limit is 1000 characters for the message content and 60 characters for custom titles.

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.a1: We use industry-standard encryption and security measures. Your account data is stored securely, and message content is only processed temporarily and not permanently stored.
privacy.a2: No, we do not permanently store your message content. Text is processed by our AI service and immediately discarded after translation.
